elouan_de_vassy.name: Elouan de Vassy
elouan_de_vassy.description: A brilliant but anxious young cartographer forced into espionage. He is driven by a desire for a peaceful France where borders are drawn with ink rather than blood.

appearance.height_and_build: 5'7" with a lean, wiry build and a slight nervous slouch.
appearance.hair_style_and_color: Messy, chin-length dark brown hair often tucked behind ears [RGB: 75, 54, 33]
appearance.eye_color: Intelligent hazel eyes with flecks of gold [RGB: 107, 142, 35]
appearance.facial_features: Sharp, bird-like nose and a thin, expressive mouth.
appearance.distinctive_features: A small, jagged scar across his left knuckles from a quill-knife accident.
appearance.clothing: A travel-worn doublet of forest green wool [RGB: 34, 48, 30] over a stained linen shirt [RGB: 245, 245, 220]. He wears sturdy leather breeches [RGB: 62, 39, 35] and mud-splattered knee-high boots.
appearance.accessories: A waterproof leather cylinder for maps slung across his back and a hidden dagger in his boot.

father_bastien_thorne.name: Father Bastien Thorne
father_bastien_thorne.description: A high-ranking member of the League’s secret police, the Red Capes. He is a zealot who believes that any cruelty is justified to purge heresy from Paris.

appearance.height_and_build: 6'2" with a gaunt, skeletal frame that makes him appear taller.
appearance.hair_style_and_color: Tonsured, with a fringe of salt-and-pepper hair [RGB: 169, 169, 169]
appearance.facial_features: Deep-set eyes, high cheekbones, and a thin, bloodless lip.
appearance.distinctive_features: A burn mark in the shape of a cross on his right palm.
appearance.clothing: A heavy, crimson wool cape with a high collar [RGB: 139, 0, 0] over a black Jesuit cassock [RGB: 20, 20, 20].
appearance.accessories: A heavy iron rosary with sharp-edged beads and a silver-hilted rapier.

the_clerk.name: The Clerk
the_clerk.description: A clerk from the Châtelet who helped Elouan source vellum. Now a condemned man, accused of Politique sympathies, awaiting execution on the scaffold.

appearance.height_and_build: 5'9" with a thin, wiry frame weakened by imprisonment.
appearance.skin_tone: Pale, sallow from dungeon confinement [RGB: 205, 180, 155], mottled with bruises [RGB: 90, 60, 100]
appearance.hair_style_and_color: Matted, unkempt dark hair plastered to his forehead with sweat [RGB: 45, 35, 25]
appearance.eye_color: Bloodshot brown eyes wide with terror [RGB: 100, 70, 50]
appearance.facial_features: Face swollen and bruised from interrogation, split lip, hollow cheeks.
appearance.distinctive_features: A mask of bruised pulp - swollen left eye, dried blood at the corner of his mouth, broken nose.
appearance.clothing: A torn, filthy linen shirt [RGB: 180, 170, 150] stained with blood and dirt. No shoes, bare feet caked with mud.
appearance.accessories: Hands bound behind him with coarse hemp rope. A wooden placard around his neck declaring his crimes.

marquise_genevieve_daubigne.name: Marquise Genevieve d'Aubigné
marquise_genevieve_daubigne.description: A brilliant strategist and covert leader of the Politique network in Paris. She navigates the dangerous social waters of the League while plotting Henri's coronation.

appearance.height_and_build: 5'5" with a graceful, poised posture and an authoritative air.
appearance.hair_style_and_color: Elaborately braided and pinned up, auburn in color [RGB: 139, 69, 19]
appearance.facial_features: Soft features but with a firm, determined jawline.
appearance.distinctive_features: A beauty mark just above her left lip.
appearance.clothing: A high-collared gown of tarnished silver silk [RGB: 192, 192, 192] with black lace detailing [RGB: 10, 10, 10].
appearance.accessories: A fan that hides a coded cipher and a ring containing a secret compartment for poison.

the_barricades_of_paris.name: The Barricades of Paris
the_barricades_of_paris.description: A claustrophobic labyrinth of narrow streets blocked by overturned wagons, barrels of stones, and heavy chains. It is the heart of the League's power, smelling of woodsmoke and damp earth.

visual_details.architecture_landscape: Timber-framed houses leaning over muddy alleys, reinforced with makeshift wooden walls and iron grates.
visual_details.colors: Grimy browns [RGB: 80, 60, 45], charcoal greys [RGB: 50, 50, 50], and the flickering orange of torches [RGB: 255, 140, 0].
visual_details.lighting_conditions: Low, high-contrast lighting; deep shadows cast by flickering braziers and hanging lanterns.
visual_details.textures_and_materials: Rough-hewn wood, cold cobblestones, rusted iron, and wet, trampled straw.
visual_details.atmospheric_elements: A perpetual haze of coal smoke and the distant, rhythmic tolling of church bells.
visual_details.time_of_day_weather: Twilight under a heavy, overcast sky; a light, persistent drizzle.

the_camp_of_the_white_plume.name: The Camp of the White Plume
the_camp_of_the_white_plume.description: A sprawling mobile city of tents and wagons located in the Loire Valley. It is a place of military discipline mixed with the desperate hope of a kingdom in exile.

visual_details.architecture_landscape: Vast fields filled with canvas tents of varying sizes, centered around a large, royal pavilion made of reinforced leather.
visual_details.colors: Weathered canvas white [RGB: 220, 220, 200], steel blue [RGB: 70, 130, 180], and the bright white of Henri's plume [RGB: 255, 255, 255].
visual_details.lighting_conditions: Bright, harsh daylight reflecting off polished armor and spear tips.
visual_details.textures_and_materials: Heavy canvas, oiled leather, polished steel, and the green grass of the valley flattened by thousands of boots.
visual_details.atmospheric_elements: The sound of Huguenot psalms, the smell of roasting meat and horse manure, and the snap of banners in the wind.
visual_details.time_of_day_weather: Clear morning with a crisp, cool breeze.

the_sword_joyeuse.name: The Sword Joyeuse
the_sword_joyeuse.description: The legendary coronation sword of the Kings of France, rumored to possess divine power and legitimacy.
the_sword_joyeuse.appearance: A 32-inch blade of shimmering Damascus steel [RGB: 192, 192, 192] with a hilt encased in gold filigree [RGB: 212, 175, 55]. The pommel is set with a large, uncut ruby [RGB: 155, 17, 30], and the grip is wrapped in purple velvet and gold wire.

the_league_pamphlet.name: The League Pamphlet
the_league_pamphlet.description: A crudely printed but effective propaganda sheet used to incite the Parisian mobs against Henri.
the_league_pamphlet.appearance: A single sheet of rough, yellowed hemp paper [RGB: 240, 230, 140] featuring a woodblock illustration of a multi-headed beast wearing a crown. The ink is thick and unevenly applied [RGB: 10, 10, 10].

the_alchemical_alembic.name: The Alchemical Alembic
the_alchemical_alembic.description: A complex glass and copper apparatus used for distilling the volatile components of 'Greek Fire'.
the_alchemical_alembic.appearance: A bulbous glass flask [RGB: 173, 216, 230] connected by spiraling copper tubes [RGB: 184, 115, 51] to a collection jar filled with a glowing, viscous green liquid [RGB: 50, 205, 50]. It stands roughly 18 inches tall.

style.description: A 'Decaying Renaissance' aesthetic that blends the opulence of the 16th century with the grime and brutality of 16th-century warfare. It draws heavily from Chiaroscuro painting techniques.
style.typeface: A combination of elegant, slightly weathered serif for body text and bold, woodblock-style blackletter for headings.
style.inking: Dense, textural inking with heavy use of cross-hatching and deep blacks to create a sense of weight and dread.
style.coloring: A desaturated, earthy palette punctuated by high-saturation symbolic colors like 'League Crimson' and 'Royalist White'.
style.line_width: Variable line weights; thin and delicate for architectural details, thick and expressive for characters and foreground elements.
style.palette: Dominant tones of Mud [RGB: 90, 75, 60], Steel [RGB: 150, 150, 160], and Smoke [RGB: 110, 110, 110], with accents of Gold [RGB: 180, 150, 50] and Blood Red [RGB: 120, 0, 0].
style.shading: Dramatic chiaroscuro shading, emphasizing single light sources (torches, candles, sunbeams) to create deep, cinematic shadows.
style.texture: Heavy use of grit, film grain, and organic textures like distressed parchment, rusted metal, and damp stone.
